MARKETING CLOUD GROWTH
Activate Einstein Features in Marketing Cloud Growth

Marketing Cloud Growth includes features that use generative AI and predictive AI to save time and improve your KPIs. When you use Einstein, the security of your business and customer data is protected by the Einstein Trust Layer. Choose which Einstein features can help your business. These features aren’t dependent on each other, so you can enable them separately.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Salesforce Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with Marketing Cloud Growth Edition


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To enable Einstein features:	Marketing Cloud Admin permission set
Get Started Quickly with Campaign Briefs

To jump-start a new marketing effort, Einstein can draft a campaign brief and suggest a relevant segment. To use this Einstein Co-Create feature in Marketing Cloud Growth, you enable settings for generative AI and in Data Cloud.

Enable Einstein generative AI.
To turn on Einstein Segment Creation, search Features, select Feature Manager, and enable the feature.
To turn on Einstein campaign briefs, search Create, select Co-create with Einstein, and click Activate.

After you turn on these features, they’re immediately available.

Optimize Email Send Times

Einstein Send Time Optimization (STO) is a predictive AI feature that optimizes your email sends based on historical data that indicates when individuals are most likely to open them. To use this feature, your org must opt in to the Global Data Model for Einstein.

Verify that you have an identity resolution ruleset that uses Individual as the primary data model object.
This ruleset must be one of the first two identity resolution rulesets that you create for Marketing Cloud Growth.
From Setup, in the Quick Find box, enter Send Time, and select Einstein Send Time Optimization (STO) with Global Models.
Review the global model information, and click Activate.

STO needs some time to gather data and build a model that’s specific to your data. To check on the STO model status, return to the setup page. If you deactivate this feature, new messages can’t use it, but existing email sends still include optimized send times.

For more information about data, review the STO Model Card.

Filter Non-Human Clicks from Your Report

Einstein Metrics Guard uses predictive AI to filter bot activity from your org’s engagement metrics. It removes most clicks and opens generated by security scanner bots without filtering out legitimate visitor activity.

From Setup, in the Quick Find box, enter Messaging.
Under Email, select Email Feature Settings.
Turn on the feature.

If you deactivate this feature, your engagement metrics are more likely to include bot activity.
